title: The Fed Broke Its Promises | Guests: Dr. Simone Gold & Loren Culp | 8/3/20
description:
Will Glenn be quarantined forever? The U.S. credit rating is in trouble as our money loses value. College football players released a list social justice of demands. The government’s COVID-19 restrictions didn’t apply at John Lewis’ funeral. A 70-year-old Arizona woman was threatened with jail time for running takeout in a parking lot during lockdown and attorney Kurt Altman joins to discuss. Protesters outside a Planned Parenthood were arrested for “defacing property” with chalk. Dr. Simone Gold joins after being fired for what the hospital called an “embarrassing video” supporting hydroxychloroquine. GOP candidate Loren Culp discusses his run against Washington Gov. Jay Inslee and how he we can stop the lockdown madness.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
